greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest composite c such that n^(c-1) =/= 1 (mod c^2), i.e., smallest composite c that is not a "Wieferich pseudoprime" to base n.
comment: Smallest composite c such that n does not occur in row c of the array in A244752. - _Felix Fröhlich_, Jan 07 2017
link: Felix Fröhlich, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
results.author: _Felix Fröhlich_, May 20 2016
